summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1184, for the improvement of East Roy Street, from North Broadway to Eastlake Avenue, and Lakeview Avenue, as established by Ordinance No. 10022, from East Roy Street to Eastlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 13137 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
